Description:
Lead Data Scientist (Boston, MA) compensation: $180k

As a leader in location technology and Intelligence, this company is looking for a Lead Data Scientist to join their team.

YOUR CAREER GOALS

Contribute to the mission of leveraging a massive and growing set of diverse location information to solve global challenges. Building on your experience, you will be leading the data science efforts and ultimately leading a team of data scientists.

YOUR AMAZING QUALITIES

You're passionate about defining the Machine Learning roadmap and then being the owner of modeling and delivering Machine Learning technology to support products and capabilities. You have either a MS or Phd in computer science, AI or machine learning and professional experience using:
  • Python
  • R
  • SQL
  • Hive
  • Spark
And if you've got knowledge or experience in :
  • Data Modeling
  • Big Data and Machine Learning (geospatial datasets)
  • Probability and Statistics
...those are certainly pluses!

You must also be able to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Leadership ability and excellent interpersonal & communication skills here are absolutely essential.

IN EXCHANGE FOR YOUR HARD WORK

We offer you:
  • A comprehensive health & medical benefits package
  • Equity
  • Generous PTO
  • 401(k) plan
  • And much more!
